content.query:
IF OBJECT_ID('Stg_DailyPrice', 'U') IS NOT NULL
    DROP TABLE Stg_DailyPrice;

CREATE TABLE Stg_DailyPrice (
	[SYMBOL] VARCHAR(50)
	,[SERIES] CHAR(10)
	,[OPEN] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[HIGH] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[LOW] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[CLOSE] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[LAST] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[PREVCLOSE] DECIMAL(10, 2)
	,[TOTTRDQTY] BIGINT
	,[TOTTRDVAL] DECIMAL(38, 2)
	,[TIMESTAMP] VARCHAR(15)
	,[TOTALTRADES] BIGINT
	,[ISIN] VARCHAR(50)
	,[FileName] VARCHAR(50)

	);
